problem_text_cn: 如图是小明设计用手电来测量某古城墙高度的示意图．点P处放一水平的平面镜,光线从点A出发经平面镜反射后刚好射到古城墙CD的顶端C处,已知AB⊥BD,CD⊥BD,且测得AB=1.2米,BP=1.8米,PD=12米,那么该古城墙的高度是()
problem_text_en: The picture is a schematic diagram of Xiao Ming designed a flashlight to measure the height of an ancient city wall. A horizontal plane mirror is placed at point P. The light starts from point A and is reflected by the plane mirror and just hits the top C of the ancient city wall CD. It is known that AB ⊥ BD, CD ⊥ BD, and the measured AB = N_0, BP = N_1, PD = N_2, then the height of the ancient city wall is ()
raw_answer:
解:
由题意知:光线AP与光线PC,∠APB=∠CPD,∴Rt△ABP∽Rt△CDP,∴\frac{AB}{CD}=\frac{BP}{PD},∴CD=\frac{1.2×12}{1.8}=8(米)．
故选:B．
